nocturnals.title: How do I start playing?
nocturnals.body:
Getting started with Nocturnals is easy!

  1. Download and install the game from Steam
  2. Launch the game and wait for initial setup
  3. Choose your character from the character selection screen
  4. Complete the tutorial to learn basic controls and mechanics

The tutorial covers movement, jumping, interaction, and basic combat. Don't worry if you need to reference controls later - you can access the control guide anytime from the pause menu.

nocturnals.title: What are the system requirements?
nocturnals.body:
Nocturnals has modest system requirements:

Minimum Requirements:

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 / AMD FX-4300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space (SSD recommended)

nocturnals.title: Can I play with friends?
nocturnals.body:
Yes! Nocturnals supports local multiplayer for up to 4 players.

To start a multiplayer session:

  1. From the main menu, select "Multiplayer"
  2. Choose "Local Co-op"
  3. Connect up to 4 controllers (Xbox and PlayStation controllers supported)
  4. Select your characters and start playing!

Each player can choose from the same roster of characters, and progress is shared among all players. Local multiplayer uses split-screen when players are far apart, and a shared camera when they're close together.

nocturnals.title: How do I save my progress?
nocturnals.body:
Nocturnals uses an automatic save system - you don't need to manually save your game.

Your progress is saved automatically at:

  • Checkpoints: Regular save points throughout levels
  • Level completion: After finishing any level
  • Character upgrades: When you unlock new abilities
  • Settings changes: When you modify game options

If you're playing on Steam, your save data is also backed up to Steam Cloud, so you can continue your progress on different computers.

Note: The game saves automatically, but avoid closing the game during the "Saving..." indicator to prevent data loss.

nocturnals.title: What controls do I use?
nocturnals.body:
Nocturnals supports both keyboard/mouse and controller input:

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD: Move character
  • Space: Jump
  • Mouse: Aim and interact
  • Left Click: Primary action/attack
  • Right Click: Secondary action
  • E: Interact with objects
  • ESC: Pause menu
  • Tab: Inventory/character screen

Controller Support:

Xbox and PlayStation controllers are fully supported with haptic feedback. Controller mappings can be customized in the settings menu.

You can also remap any keyboard controls in Settings > Controls.

nocturnals.title: How do I change graphics settings?
nocturnals.body:
Graphics settings can be accessed from multiple locations:

From Main Menu:

  1. Click "Settings" from the main menu
  2. Select "Graphics" tab
  3. Adjust settings and click "Apply"

During Gameplay:

  1. Press ESC to open pause menu
  2. Select "Settings"
  3. Navigate to "Graphics" tab

    4. Available Options:

    • Resolution: Display resolution
    • Display Mode: Fullscreen, windowed, borderless
    • Quality Preset: Low, Medium, High, Ultra
    • VSync: On/Off
    • Frame Rate Limit: 30/60/120/Unlimited

    Changes take effect immediately, and the game will remember your preferences.

nocturnals.title: Can I use a controller?
nocturnals.body:
Yes! Nocturnals has excellent controller support.

Supported Controllers:

  • Xbox controllers: Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S (wired and wireless)
  • PlayStation controllers: PS4 DualShock 4, PS5 DualSense (wired and wireless)
  • Generic controllers: Most DirectInput and XInput compatible controllers

Features:

  • Haptic feedback: Controller vibration for immersive gameplay
  • Custom mapping: Remap any button in settings
  • Multiple controllers: Support for up to 4 controllers simultaneously
  • Automatic detection: Plug and play - no additional setup required

If your controller isn't detected, try using Steam's controller support or check our troubleshooting guide.

nocturnals.title: How do I report bugs?
nocturnals.body:
We appreciate bug reports! Here's how to help us fix issues:

Best Methods:

  • Discord: Join our Discord server and use the #bug-reports channel
  • Email: Send details to team@cowboytoad.games

What to Include:

  • Description: What happened vs. what you expected
  • Steps to reproduce: How to trigger the bug
  • System info: OS, graphics card, controller type
  • Screenshots/video: Visual evidence if applicable
  • Save file: If the bug affects progression

We aim to respond to all bug reports within 72 hours. Critical bugs that prevent gameplay are our highest priority.

nocturnals-cacti-coast.title: When will Cacti Coast be released?
nocturnals-cacti-coast.body:
Nocturnals: Cacti Coast is currently in active development.

While we don't have a specific release date yet, we're targeting late 2025 for the initial PC release. We want to ensure the game meets our quality standards and provides the experience our community deserves.

Stay updated:

  • Wishlist on Steam to get notified the moment we announce a release date
  • Join our Discord for development updates and behind-the-scenes content
  • Follow our social media for regular progress updates

We'll be sharing more details about release timing as development progresses!

nocturnals-cacti-coast.title: Will my Nocturnals save carry over?
nocturnals-cacti-coast.body:
We're actively working on save data compatibility between Nocturnals and Cacti Coast.

What we're planning:

  • Character unlocks: Your unlocked characters should carry over
  • Achievement progress: Completed achievements will be recognized
  • Cosmetic items: Any unlocked cosmetics will transfer
  • Story progression: Completed story milestones will be acknowledged

What might not transfer:

  • Specific save file positions (Cacti Coast has new levels)
  • Some technical settings that may change

This is still being finalized during development, but save compatibility is a priority for us. We'll provide more details as we get closer to release.

nocturnals-cacti-coast.title: What new features are planned?
nocturnals-cacti-coast.body:
Cacti Coast will significantly expand on the original Nocturnals experience:

New Content:

  • 3 New Biomes: Desert, Oasis, and Underground Caverns
  • Enhanced Story: Deeper character development and new storylines
  • New Characters: Additional playable characters with unique abilities
  • Extended Campaign: 50% more content than the original

Gameplay Improvements:

  • Online Multiplayer: Play with friends across the internet
  • Character Customization: Customize appearance and abilities
  • Dynamic Weather: Weather effects that impact gameplay
  • Improved Combat: More responsive and varied combat system

Technical Enhancements:

  • Enhanced Graphics: Improved lighting and visual effects
  • Better Performance: Optimized for a wider range of hardware
  • Accessibility: More accessibility options for different players

nocturnals-cacti-coast.title: Can I play the beta?
nocturnals-cacti-coast.body:
We're planning a beta test program for Cacti Coast!

Beta Timeline:

  • Closed Beta: Mid-2025 for selected community members
  • Open Beta: Late 2025, closer to release

How to get Beta Access:

  • Discord Members: Beta invitations will be announced in our Discord server first
  • Steam Wishlist: Wishlist the game for potential beta key distribution
  • Community Participation: Active community members may receive priority access

What to Expect in Beta:

  • Early access to new features and content
  • Opportunity to provide feedback that shapes the final game
  • Exclusive beta cosmetic rewards
  • Direct interaction with the development team

Join our Discord to be first in line for beta announcements!

nocturnals-cacti-coast.title: What platforms will it support?
nocturnals-cacti-coast.body:
Cacti Coast will launch on multiple platforms, with a staggered release schedule:

Launch Platforms (Late 2025):

  • PC (Steam): Windows, with potential Mac/Linux support
  • Steam Deck: Verified compatibility at launch

Console Versions (2026):

  • Nintendo Switch: Optimized for handheld and docked play
  • PlayStation 5: Enhanced with DualSense haptic feedback
  • Xbox Series X/S: Optimized for both console variants

Why the Staggered Release?

We want to ensure each platform gets the attention it deserves. Starting with PC allows us to:

  • Gather community feedback and polish the experience
  • Optimize performance for each console's unique capabilities
  • Implement platform-specific features (like Nintendo Switch's portability)

Console players who wishlist on their platform of choice will be notified as soon as those versions are available!

nocturnals-cacti-coast.title: Will there be new multiplayer modes?
nocturnals-cacti-coast.body:
Yes! Cacti Coast will feature significantly expanded multiplayer options:

Online Multiplayer:

  • Co-op Campaign: Play the full story with up to 6 friends online
  • Cross-platform Play: Play with friends regardless of their platform
  • Drop-in/Drop-out: Friends can join your game anytime
  • Voice Chat Integration: Built-in voice communication

New Game Modes:

  • Survival Mode: Work together to survive waves of enemies
  • Time Trials: Compete for fastest completion times
  • Exploration Challenges: Collaborative puzzle-solving mode
  • Custom Games: Create your own game rules and challenges

Enhanced Local Play:

  • Up to 6 local players: More friends can join the couch co-op experience
  • Better camera system: Improved split-screen and shared camera mechanics
  • Mixed online/local: Combine local and online players in the same session

All multiplayer modes are designed to be accessible to players of different skill levels!
